page.title: 0238 Years of Pakenham Life
page.content: The Junior class went to see a lady called Miss Loach who has lived in the village for many years. Q.How long have you lived here? A.Since 1947,which is 38 years. Q.Why did you move here? A.Because I love the Suffolk country side. Q.Was Manor Garth built? A.No,there was a field that belonged to me. Q.Why did you sell the field? A.The Council purchased part of it to build the School on - I had no choice.The part that remained was not big enough to do anything useful with, so I sold it for building land. Q.Did the watermill and windmill work? A.Yes we got chicken feed from the windmill. Q. Was there a baker in Pakenham? (continued on page 3)
